verses.verse: God <WH430> presides <WH5324> in the great <WH410> assembly. <WH5712> He judges <WH8199> among <WH7130> the gods. <WH430>
"How long will you judge <WH8199> unjustly, <WH5766> and show <WH5375> partiality <WH6440> to the wicked? <WH7563>" Selah. <WH5542>
"Defend <WH8199> the weak, <WH1800> the poor, and the fatherless. <WH3490> Maintain the rights <WH6663> of the poor <WH6041> and oppressed. <WH7326>
Rescue <WH6403> the weak <WH1800> and needy. <WH34> Deliver <WH6403> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked. <WH7563>"
They don't <WH3045> know, neither do they understand. <WH995> They walk <WH1980> back and forth in darkness. <WH2825> All the foundations <WH4144> of the earth <WH776> are shaken. <WH4131>
I said, <WH559> "You are gods, <WH430> all of you are sons <WH1121> of the Most High. <WH5945>
Nevertheless <WH403> you shall die <WH4191> like men, <WH120> and fall <WH5307> like one <WH259> of the rulers. <WH8269>"
Arise, <WH6965> God, <WH430> judge <WH8199> the earth, <WH776> for you inherit <WH5157> all of the nations. <WH1471>
